comment: "This was my second piece in a month for In These Times. They're good to work with but don't pay much considering the work involved in this particular piece. Nonprofit outfit. Great people."

comment: "I'm a retired newspaper editor and journalist who likes to do a piece every so often. This particular one was actually an analysis, but I guess you could brand it as an opinion or column or some such. Just research. No interviews. Fix as you see fit."
